item.title: What's cool about Unison?
item.description:
Unison is doing a lot of interesting things, and as I recently implemented an alternative runtime in rust, I have some insight into what's going on under the hood ðŸ˜‰. Here's my attempt to sum things up.

7 minute read [DRAFT]
